front.title: GMPLS Signaling Extensions for Shared Mesh Protection

abstract.t: ITU-T Recommendation G.808.3 defines the generic aspects of a Shared Mesh Protection (SMP) mechanism, where the difference between SMP and Shared Mesh Restoration (SMR) is also identified. ITU-T Recommendation G.873.3 defines the protection switching operation and associated protocol for SMP at the Optical Data Unit (ODU) layer. RFC 7412 provides requirements for any mechanism that would be used to implement SMP in a Multi-Protocol Label Switching - Transport Profile (MPLS-TP) network. This document updates RFC 4872 to provide the extensions to the Generalized Multi-Protocol Label Switching (GMPLS) signaling to support the control of the SMP.
